categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Falloon, who was really the Black Sun accountant Soolehad, was a Rodian who lived on the planet Sriluur during the Yuuzhan Vong War. Falloon offered a group of Jedi supporters a large amount of credits to help him escape from Peace Brigade goons. They managed to get him to his ship, the Gilded Thranta, along with his droid 9T-LOM.
